documents.relevance_reason: Document provides a comprehensive view of banks' capital adequacy under various stress testing scenarios, addressing compliance requirements for Liquidity Coverage Ratio and Collateral & Margin Requirements.

Specifically, it highlights potential capital adequacy issues and excessive leverage ratios, which are critical components of the Basel III Framework.
